name: Tokkan
description:
What is Tokkan?

Tokkan is a videogame in which, you control a teen, called Kumino, that has entered into a digital world, called Tokkan. His mission is to discover the mystery, and get out as quick as possible to prevent any danger. 

During your adventure, you will find yourself in very different situations, such as, dealing with monsters, avoiding traps or trying not to get killed by digital virus, that are presented in several forms.

The game has 4 different and unique levels. Each level has its difficulty and has completely different things to do. 

You will have to use your transformation in order to reach certain platforms and places to get, so give it a good use! At the same time, try not to fall into the void, because if so, you will die. The game is planned, to complete each level without dying, so you have to get  used to your amount of HP, and other factors, like the damage the enemies deal you. If you die, everything will restart and if you get to the next level, you will heal up.

This game was made by Sergio Rubio Wandossell. Currently studying Design and Dev of Videogames at ESI (Escuela Superior Internacional de Diseño), Murcia. 

Enjoy it!
